influxdb/
lib.rs

1//! This library is a work in progress. This means a feature you might need is not implemented
2//! yet or could be handled better.
3//!
4//! Pull requests are always welcome. See [Contributing](https://github.com/influxdb-rs/influxdb-rust/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/influxdb-rs/influxdb-rust/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). For a list of past changes, see [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/influxdb-rs/influxdb-rust/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).
5//!
6//! ## Currently Supported Features
7//!
8//! -   Reading and Writing to InfluxDB
9//! -   Optional Serde Support for Deserialization
10//! -   Running multiple queries in one request (e.g. `SELECT * FROM weather_berlin; SELECT * FROM weather_london`)
11//! -   Writing single or multiple measurements in one request (e.g. `WriteQuery` or `Vec<WriteQuery>` argument)
12//! -   Authenticated and Unauthenticated Connections
13//! -   `async`/`await` support
14//! -   `#[derive(InfluxDbWriteable)]` Derive Macro for Writing / Reading into Structs
15//! -   `GROUP BY` support
16//! -   Tokio and async-std support (see example below) or [available backends](https://github.com/influxdb-rs/influxdb-rust/blob/main/influxdb/Cargo.toml)
17//! -   Swappable HTTP backends ([see below](#Choice-of-HTTP-backend))
18//!
19//! # Quickstart
20//!
21//! Add the following to your `Cargo.toml`
22//!
23#![doc = cargo_toml!(indent="", "derive")]
24//!
25//! For an example with using Serde deserialization, please refer to [serde_integration](crate::integrations::serde_integration)
26//!
27//! ```rust,no_run
28//! use chrono::{DateTime, Utc};
29//! use influxdb::{Client, Error, InfluxDbWriteable, ReadQuery, Timestamp};
30//!
31//! #[tokio::main]
32//! // or #[async_std::main] if you prefer
33//! async fn main() -> Result<(), Error> {
34//!     // Connect to db `test` on `http://localhost:8086`
35//!     let client = Client::new("http://localhost:8086", "test");
36//!
37//!     #[derive(InfluxDbWriteable)]
38//!     struct WeatherReading {
39//!         time: DateTime<Utc>,
40//!         humidity: i32,
41//!         #[influxdb(tag)]
42//!         wind_direction: String,
43//!     }
44//!
45//!     // Let's write some data into a measurement called `weather`
46//!     let weather_readings = vec![
47//!         WeatherReading {
48//!             time: Timestamp::Hours(1).into(),
49//!             humidity: 30,
50//!             wind_direction: String::from("north"),
51//!         }
52//!         .into_query("weather"),
53//!         WeatherReading {
54//!             time: Timestamp::Hours(2).into(),
55//!             humidity: 40,
56//!             wind_direction: String::from("west"),
57//!         }
58//!         .into_query("weather"),
59//!     ];
60//!
61//!     client.query(weather_readings).await?;
62//!
63//!     // Let's see if the data we wrote is there
64//!     let read_query = ReadQuery::new("SELECT * FROM weather");
65//!
66//!     let read_result = client.query(read_query).await?;
67//!     println!("{}", read_result);
68//!     Ok(())
69//! }
70//! ```
71//!
72//! For further examples, check out the Integration Tests in `tests/integration_tests.rs`
73//! in the repository.
74//!
75//! # Choice of HTTP backend
76//!
77//! To communicate with InfluxDB, you can choose the HTTP backend to be used configuring the appropriate feature. We recommend sticking with the default reqwest-based client, unless you really need async-std compatibility.
78//!
79//! - **[hyper](https://github.com/hyperium/hyper)** (through reqwest, used by default), with [rustls](https://github.com/ctz/rustls)
80#![doc = cargo_toml!(indent="\t", "derive")]
81//! - **[hyper](https://github.com/hyperium/hyper)** (through reqwest), with native TLS (OpenSSL)
82#![doc = cargo_toml!(indent="\t", default-features = false, "derive", "use-serde", "reqwest-client")]
83//! - **[hyper](https://github.com/hyperium/hyper)** (through surf), use this if you need tokio 0.2 compatibility
84#![doc = cargo_toml!(indent="\t", default-features = false, "derive", "use-serde", "hyper-client")]
85//! - **[curl](https://github.com/alexcrichton/curl-rust)**, using [libcurl](https://curl.se/libcurl/)
86#![doc = cargo_toml!(indent="\t", default-features = false, "derive", "use-serde", "curl-client")]
87//! - **[async-h1](https://github.com/http-rs/async-h1)** with native TLS (OpenSSL)
88#![doc = cargo_toml!(indent="\t", default-features = false, "derive", "use-serde", "h1-client")]
89//! - **[async-h1](https://github.com/http-rs/async-h1)** with [rustls](https://github.com/ctz/rustls)
90#![doc = cargo_toml!(indent="\t", default-features = false, "derive", "use-serde", "h1-client-rustls")]
91//! - WebAssembly's `window.fetch`, via `web-sys` and **[wasm-bindgen](https://github.com/rustwasm/wasm-bindgen)**
92#![doc = cargo_toml!(indent="\t", default-features = false, "derive", "use-serde", "wasm-client")]
93//!
94//! # License
95//!
96//! [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
97
98#![allow(clippy::needless_doctest_main)]
99#![allow(clippy::needless_lifetimes)] // False positive in client/mod.rs query fn
100#![forbid(bare_trait_objects)]
101
102macro_rules! cargo_toml {
103    (indent=$indent:literal, $firstfeat:literal $(, $feature:literal)*) => {
104        cargo_toml_private!($indent, "", $firstfeat $(, $feature)*)
105    };
106
107    (indent=$indent:literal, default-features = false, $firstfeat:literal $(, $feature:literal)*) => {
108        cargo_toml_private!($indent, "default-features = false,", $firstfeat $(, $feature)*)
109    };
110}
111
112macro_rules! cargo_toml_private {
113    ($indent:literal, $deffeats:literal, $firstfeat:literal $(, $feature:literal)*) => {
114        concat!(
115            $indent,
116            "```toml\n",
117
118            $indent,
119            "influxdb = { version = \"",
120            env!("CARGO_PKG_VERSION"),
121            "\", ",
122            $deffeats,
123            "features = [",
124            "\"", $firstfeat, "\"",
125            $(", \"", $feature, "\"",)*
126            "] }\n",
127
128            $indent,
129            "```"
130        )
131    };
132}
133
134#[cfg(all(feature = "reqwest", feature = "surf"))]
135compile_error!("You need to choose between reqwest and surf; enabling both is not supported");
136
137#[cfg(not(any(feature = "reqwest", feature = "surf")))]
138compile_error!("You need to choose an http client; consider not disabling default features");
139
140mod client;
141mod error;
142mod query;
143
144pub use client::Client;
145pub use error::Error;
146pub use query::{
147    read_query::ReadQuery,
148    write_query::{Type, WriteQuery},
149    InfluxDbWriteable, Query, QueryType, Timestamp, ValidQuery,
150};
151
152#[cfg(feature = "use-serde")]
153pub mod integrations {
154    #[cfg(feature = "use-serde")]
155    pub mod serde_integration;
156}
